HotelElement.Name: Santa Maria Executive Suites Fremantle B and B

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Santa Maria Executive B&B Fremantle in Beaconsfield (Fremantle), you'll be convenient to Royal Fremantle Golf Club and Fremantle Prison. This bed & breakfast is within close proximity of Samson House and Fremantle Markets.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 3 guestrooms featuring minibars and espresso makers. 40-inch LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in and express check-out. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 25 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Royal Fremantle Golf Club - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Fremantle Prison - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Samson House - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Fremantle Markets - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Kings Square - 3.1 km / 2 mi
University of Notre Dame Australia - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Round House - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Western Australian Maritime Museum - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Beeliar Regional Park - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Adventure World - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Leighton Battery Heritage Site - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Aviation Heritage Museum - 8 km / 5 mi
Cottesloe Beach - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
University of Western Australia - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Claremont Showgrounds - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

The preferred airport for Santa Maria Executive B&B Fremantle is Perth, WA (PER) - 23 km / 14.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
